short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to view pages in a wide layout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BC Maximizer is a simple and effective Chrome extension that helps you view pages in a wide layout on Dynamics Business Central. This extension is the only one of its kind, providing a unique feature that makes it easier to view more information on the screen at once.

From version 0.0.4 there is a new feature supported; BC Maximizer will automatically switch tiles to list view on list pages.

With BC Maximizer, there is no need for complicated setup or configuration. The extension works immediately after installation, so you can start maximizing the layout view of any Dynamics Business Central page right away.

Using BC Maximizer is easy: once installed, the extension automatically detects when you are on a Dynamics Business Central page and activates the wide layout for you. The extension is fast, reliable, and lightweight, making it an ideal tool for business owners, accountants, and other professionals who need to work with Dynamics Business Central on a regular basis.

Give BC Maximizer a try and see how it can help you save time and increase your productivity while working with Dynamics Business Central.
